snippet: An upscale indoor shooting range — complete with gun-toting hostesses — has an array of machine guns, from AK-47s to M-4s, for anyone looking for a different Vegas experience.
abstract: Machine Guns Vegas, an upscale indoor shooting range that features skimpily dressed, gun-toting hostesses and an array of machine guns from AK-47s to M-4s, opens in Las Vegas; club offers the latest example of how the extravagances and excesses that have defined the Nevada city are moving beyond the gambling table.
lead_paragraph: An upscale indoor shooting range — complete with gun-toting hostesses — has an array of machine guns, from AK-47s to M-4s, for anyone looking for a different Vegas experience.

headline.seo: Las Vegas Gun Range Offers New Way to Let Loose
headline.main: There’s Gambling, Floor Shows ... and ‘Full Auto’ in Las Vegas
headline.print_headline: There’s Gambling, Floor Shows ... And ‘Full Auto’ in Las Vegas
